title: Interpretation of seeing pumpkins in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing pumpkins in a dream is one of the dreams that has many interpretations and clues, most of which are useful to the viewer, especially since pumpkins are one of the beautiful fruits that many love, so we will try to show some details to see pumpkins in a dream to the scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin, but for the sake of transparency that our site enjoys, We must emphasize that the explanations we will give are not like that. Where the interpretation does not depend on sight alone, but depends on a lot of information that people need to know. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing pumpkins in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing pumpkins in a dream. Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of zucchini as an indication that this dream indicates abundance. Sustenance and goodness that the dreamer will gain in the coming days - God willing. Also, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing squash in a dream shows the fear that the dreamer may feel about some things that may happen to him, and this dream may indicate a warning to the dreamer. Ibn Sirin also says that zucchini Cooked zucchini in a dream indicates strong love and stability in life and the relationship between family and friends. Also, cooked zucchini in a dream may indicate some important decisions that the dreamer will make quickly, which will have a negative impact on the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing zucchini in a dream One dream of an unmarried girl who sees yellow zucchini or wilted zucchini in a dream, this may indicate the fears and problems that this girl is suffering from. Green zucchini in the dream of an unmarried girl is also an indication that this girl has generosity and high morals. As for the dream of an unmarried girl A married woman in a dream about cooking pumpkin, it may mean that she will get married soon. Besides the fact that an unmarried girl saw herself in a dream eating zucchini and the taste was delicious, this may indicate almost comfort – God willing. Read also: Penguin in a dream Seeing pumpkin In a dream for a married woman: A married woman who sees pumpkins in a dream, this may indicate that she will give birth to a new baby - God willing - and that there are many difficulties and problems that will end soon. Also, green pumpkins in a married woman’s dream could be a sign that this woman She has a lot of money and this woman’s life is stable. Like a married woman who eats zucchini in a dream, and the taste of zucchini is delicious, these are indicators of the money diet that this woman will enjoy - God willing. Read also: Washing the dead. Seeing zucchini in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees zucchini In a dream, this may be an indicator that the pregnancy will be easy and there will be no problems - God willing. Also, the dream of a pregnant woman with zucchini is an indication of the stable state of the pregnant woman’s health and the health of the newborn - God willing. As for the pregnant woman who Dreaming of cutting pumpkins, this may be an indication that childbirth will be easy - God willing - and that the newborn will be healthy. Also, seeing an unborn girl

title: Interpretation of dreams about a relationship with a girl I know

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a relationship with a girl I know, a dream about a relationship with a girl is one of the dreams that has many interpretations and explanations, and this dream carries some negative interpretations and some positive interpretations, and the interpretations related to this dream differ according to the social status of the viewer, as the interpretation of this dream for a person differs from its interpretation for a married person, Many people in the Arab world have sought to interpret the dream of having a relationship with a girl I know. Below we highlight all the interpretations related to this dream. Interpretation of dreams for a relationship with a girl I know who is single. The dream of a relationship with a girl who is known by one person is one of the dreams that bring positive interpretations and interpretations to the fortune teller, and the interpreters said that this dream means that the fortune teller is on his way to obtaining a wonderful livelihood on the day. the next. His life period and other related interpretations In this dream, the person will obtain an excellent position in the field of work in the coming period, in addition to having a high position in society in the coming period. Interpretation of dreams for a relationship with a girl I know for a married man: seeing the same man in a relationship with a girl he knows from Dreams that have different interpretations related to the vision, and Ibn Sirin went on to explain the vision of a man having sex with a beautiful woman that there is livelihood and success in work in the future days for this man. If the man saw himself in a dream, he has a relationship with an ugly girl, this interpretation means that there is Financial losses for a man in the field of trade and business. He also pledges that this man will not reach the goals he wants in the field of work. Interpretation of a dream about an intimate relationship with his sweetheart. Here are several interpretations related to seeing the same man having intercourse in a dream with his sweetheart, which Ibn Sirin explained in his book on interpretation, We will explain these interpretations to you as follows: Seeing the same man having sex with his lover means that they will get married soon. It indicates that this man’s relationship with his lover will be fine in the near future. This dream indicates that the beloved girl he saw in the dream is suitable for him as a wife. In the future. Seeing the same man having sex with his lover means that this man will obtain a lot of money in the coming period. I dreamed that I was having sex with a beautiful girl that I met. The scholar Ibn Sirin, who specializes in dream interpretation, said that a man’s dream of a relationship with a beautiful girl that he does not know has many positive connotations that foretell the fortuneteller in next period. Ibn Sirin said as follows: It states that the person will achieve his practical goals in the coming period. It states that the business projects undertaken by this person will be crowned with success. An indication that this man will be happy in his married life if he marries. An indication of obtaining large sums of money. In a legal way. It indicates the destruction of some of the problems and worries in which this person lives. Interpretation of seeing a man marrying a woman in a dream. If a man sees in a dream another man marrying a woman in a dream, then this dream does not bode well, as all the interpretations contained in the interpretation books related to this

title: Interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream Yellow snake in a dream

preview.html: We present to you the vision of a yellow snake for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for Ibn Sirin, who was bitten by a small yellow snake. The meaning of the yellow snake according to Ibn Sirin. The snake in a dream is a symbol of knowledge, healing, deception of a woman, or hostility. The large number of snakes indicates betrayal, betrayal, and hatred on the part of relatives and family. Many appear. Of the snakes is the cunning of the friend, the evil neighbor, and the evil man. A yellow snake in a dream portends an outbreak of disease and is a sign of divorce. The yellow snake symbolizes failure and failure. It symbolizes the high cost of living, the harshness of life, and the lack of opportunities. If an unmarried woman sees the yellow snake, this means a symbol of a cunning lover, a dissolute partner, and a hated partner. Seeing a yellow snake in a dream symbolizes the hatred and hostility that the dreamer will face in reality. A yellow snake in a dream indicates envy and jealousy and warns the dreamer of the possibility of contracting a certain disease and deteriorating health. When the dreamer kills a yellow snake in his dream, this is a sign of goodness and success that he will enjoy in the future. His life. Seeing a yellow snake indicates the emotional turmoil and problems that she faces and faces in reality. This dream can also warn unmarried women of failure in some areas and the risk of contracting illness. The yellow snake in a married woman’s dream symbolizes enemies who are harassing her in reality. When she kills A married woman sees a yellow snake in her dream, as this is a sign of success and victory. This snake also indicates the marital disputes that the married woman will suffer from in reality and the danger of her final separation from her husband. Seeing a yellow snake - YouTube

title: Interpretation of dreams about white, black and colored pigeons and seeing pigeons eating in a dream

preview.html: Through our website on true dreams, learn the interpretation of a dream about a dove in a dream in detail. Many people see pigeons in their sleep in more than one form. Some people see white pigeons, others see black pigeons, others see pigeons flying while eating, dead, and other forms. There are many, so we will now talk in detail about one more form. Follow us to benefit. Interpretation of a dream about a bath. Older interpreters said about the interpretation of a dream about a pigeon that it carries different meanings and connotations and often indicates good news, because it indicates success in life and good health. Seeing a pigeon in a dream As we mentioned before, seeing a dove in a dream means good news for whom He sees it, so if he sees a dove in his dream flying towards him or sitting on his shoulder, and this vision was during the day, then this indicates a blessing in money. While seeing a dove flying away from the dreamer means defeat and failure. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a small pigeon. Seeing a dove A small dove in a dream means hearing good news about the dreamer, and seeing a small dove flying means a trip. Seeing a small dove in a dream sitting on the dreamer’s shoulder means that you will get a high promotion at work. To see yourself playing with a small dove and catching it means money and a lot of sustenance. While seeing small pigeon eggs on the bed indicates marriage to a virgin girl, and God knows best. A dove in a dream. Seeing a dove in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good offspring and may mean that he will soon have a son. While seeing a large domesticated dove shows a beautiful woman giving birth to males. Seeing a dove in a dream is for a woman. Married: Seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman generally means that you will soon hear new news and a great diet. And if she sees a female dove in his house, this indicates that she is pregnant with a male child soon, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. We recommend: Interpretation of a dream about eggs for a single woman. White dove in a dream. Seeing a dove White in a dream generally indicates safety and peace, and it also indicates abundance of sustenance. If an unmarried girl sees a white dove in her dream, this is a good sign for her, as her marriage is approaching soon, and God knows best. Seeing a white dove being slaughtered indicates disagreements and enmities, while Seeing white dove eggs means obtaining abundant money. Interpretation of seeing doves in a dream for a pregnant woman. If she sees a dove in a dream, her birth will be easy and affordable, and if she sees that she is giving birth to a large dove, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy. Unlike a small dove, it indicates that the baby will be born. It will be a girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a colored dove: If a person dreams of a colored dove in his dream, this indicates joy and happiness in his next life. A single-colored dove indicates her marriage to the person she loves. And for a married woman, her husband’s love for her, this indicates to the pregnant woman that she will give birth to twins, and by God I know. Eating pigeons in a dream. Seeing him eating pigeons in a dream means obtaining money and abundant goodness for those who see him soon.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream that I was carrying a child in my arms for an unmarried woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of my dream that I was carrying a child in my arms for an unmarried woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Dreams are usually messages from God Almighty to a person who sends him news about something future that will happen and many Muslims and scholars have talked about these dreams and interpreted them so that people know The meaning behind each dream. Since each dream is different in its interpretation from others, even if it is similar to this dream in details, for example, the interpretation of my dream that I was carrying a child in my arms for an unmarried woman is different from that of a married or widowed woman, as well as the gender of the baby In a dream, it indicates something, whether male or female. Interpretation of dreams that I was carrying a child in my arms. The Muslim scholar Ibn Sirin talks about the interpretation of my dream that I was carrying a child in my arms, and that it means happiness, contentment, and many good things for the dreamer. What if she is beautiful and smiling, then this is good, but if she is ugly or crying, then this indicates worries and problems in general life. I dreamed that I gave birth to a beautiful baby girl when I was single. The interpretation of the dream that I was carrying a baby in the arms of an unmarried woman indicates that the unmarried woman has many Good and beautiful tidings in her life, whether emotionally or professionally, the most important of which are the happy news as follows: Help, blessing, and goodness are plentiful and plentiful. A close marriage between a girl and a man who loves her very much. Compensating her for the worry and sadness that afflicted her all the time before. Achieving their goals in life. Obtaining the prestigious job. That you were looking for. Solving family problems and disputes. The interpretation of my dream that I was carrying a child in my arms is different from carrying a male child, as the gender of the newborn always indicates different considerations, as the infant in a dream is considered one of the manifestations of the nourishment that God Almighty gives to His servants and shows acceptance and love from People, which makes her steal their hearts and everyone who knows her loves her, and the most important explanation that Ibn Sirin said about the matter: The girl will get something that she longs for and she will get the coming period, in addition to this girl will become responsible for something in work and social life, so she is responsible and deserves a prominent position. Among the people. There were many interpretations of the scholar Ibn Sirin regarding the interpretation of my dream that I was carrying a child in my arms, according to the general body of the girl. Each detail of the dream has a different interpretation from others, and the most prominent interpretations of the topic are the following: If she is in good condition, she will be tied A good-natured young man with good morals. If she wears impure clothes, she will suffer from many quarrels with her family. If the young girl is talking, this indicates that the girl is not good at talking and dealing with people in reality, which causes sadness and disappointment. Interpretation of the girl’s dream Beauty for a Single WomanElegance and beauty are good qualities that make anything in life wonderful and beautiful, so the interpretation of my dream that I was carrying a child in my arms for an unmarried woman depends on how beautiful that child is. Specifically from accepting children, which gave her the characteristic of Mimi

title: Interpretation of a dream about eyebrows in a dream and the consequences of seeing eyebrows in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about eyebrows in a dream through our dreams website. See the opinion of Ibn Sirin and major dream interpreters about seeing an eyebrow in a dream and the interpretation of plucking eyebrows in a dream or drawing eyebrows in a dream and the meanings of seeing eyebrows falling out and the meanings of the symbol of eyebrows in a dream for single people. Interpretation of a dream about eyebrowsSeeing eyebrows In a dream, it means adornment, in the opinion of Ibn Sirin. Everything that happens to the eyebrow in a dream, whether good or bad, can be interpreted based on the status or prestige of the dreamer. Eyebrows in a dream indicate parents and can be a sign of work and are sometimes interpreted with knowledge, and the interpretation varies. Depending on the situation of the dreamer. Eyebrows can indicate two people of the same rank, such as a husband and wife, two business partners, or two employees. Interpretation of a dream about double or joined eyebrows indicates intimacy and love, and graying of the eyebrows indicates a change in situation Seeing thick eyebrows in a dream is praiseworthy if the eyebrows are black, and thick eyebrows in a dream can indicate growth and expansion. Seeing thick eyebrows in a woman’s dream indicates chaos, and the more eyebrows are present, the more negligent the dreamer is. See also: Interpretation of a dream about hair removal. Interpretation of a mirror in a dream. Eyebrows in a dream. Seeing a man’s eyebrows looking like a woman’s eyebrows can indicate a lack of chivalry and a lack of chivalry. Interpretation of a dream of seeing an eyebrow in a dream indicates a father or mother. Falling eyebrows in a dream is unpleasant, as it may be an indication of sadness. It may indicate calamity, and God knows best. Plucking eyebrows in a dreamThe interpretation of a dream about rubbing eyebrows in a dream could be a sign of the fortuneteller’s disobedience to his family. Interpretation of a dream about plucking eyebrows or rubbing eyebrows in a dream is a sign of rebellion in many situations. Interpretation of a dream about cutting eyebrows with scissors and a sign Adornment and interest in a woman’s beauty. Interpretation of a dream about shaving eyebrows could be a sign of the death of one’s parents, and God knows best. Drawing eyebrows in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about drawing eyebrows in a dream with henna, a sign of good obedience, and seeing eyebrows without their true color in reality indicates hypocrisy. I read about that: Putting on makeup In a dream, interpretation of a dream about henna. Eyebrows in a dream for a single woman. The symbol of eyebrows in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of celibacy and can refer to the father, brothers, children, or husband. Seeing beautiful eyebrows in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her good relationship with her relatives or family. Interpretation of a dream about eyebrows for a woman For an unmarried woman, if they are swollen, it indicates injustice, and if the eyebrow color changes, then it is hypocrisy. Grooming the eyebrows in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates kindness and good obedience. Interpretation of the eyebrows in a dream for an unmarried woman, and their shortness in the dream indicates her rebellion. The interpretation of a dream about thick eyebrows for women indicates Single women see chaos and long eyebrows in a dream for single women who insist on negligence. Also watch the video: Interpretation of seeing an eyebrow in a dream

Interpretation of a dream about double or joined eyebrows indicates intimacy and love, and graying of the eyebrows indicates a change in situation Seeing thick eyebrows in a dream is praiseworthy if the eyebrows are black, and thick eyebrows in a dream can indicate growth and expansion. Seeing thick eyebrows in a woman’s dream indicates chaos, and the more eyebrows are present, the more negligent the dreamer is. See also: Interpretation of a dream about hair removal. Interpretation of a mirror in a dream. Eyebrows in a dream. Seeing a man’s eyebrows looking like a woman’s eyebrows can indicate a lack of chivalry and a lack of chivalry. Interpretation of a dream of seeing an eyebrow in a dream indicates a father or mother. Falling eyebrows in a dream is unpleasant, as it may be an indication of sadness. It may indicate calamity, and God knows best. Plucking eyebrows in a dreamThe interpretation of a dream about rubbing eyebrows in a dream could be a sign of the fortuneteller’s disobedience to his family. Interpretation of a dream about plucking eyebrows or rubbing eyebrows in a dream is a sign of rebellion in many situations. Interpretation of a dream about cutting eyebrows with scissors and a sign Adornment and interest in a woman’s beauty. Interpretation of a dream about shaving eyebrows could be a sign of the death of one’s parents, and God knows best. Drawing eyebrows in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about drawing eyebrows in a dream with henna, a sign of good obedience, and seeing eyebrows without their true color in reality indicates hypocrisy. I read about that: Putting on makeup In a dream, interpretation of a dream about henna. Eyebrows in a dream for a single woman. The symbol of eyebrows in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of celibacy and can refer to the father, brothers, children, or husband. Seeing beautiful eyebrows in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her good relationship with her relatives or family. Interpretation of a dream about eyebrows for a woman For an unmarried woman, if they are swollen, it indicates injustice, and if the eyebrow color changes, then it is hypocrisy. Grooming the eyebrows in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates kindness and good obedience. Interpretation of the eyebrows in a dream for an unmarried woman, and their shortness in the dream indicates her rebellion. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream means security and peace, because it creates fear and anxiety in others and makes them do a lot of research behind the interpretation of this dream, its interpretation and meaning. He asks himself whether this dream portends good or evil. Reading Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream, this indicates the birth of a large offspring of children of both sexes. If an unmarried girl sees that she is reading Surat Al-Inshiqaq, this is good for her and indicates her success in everything practical, emotional, and sentimental. Social levels. Interpretation of the dream of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Inshaqaq in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In the opinion of Ibn Sirin: If he sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Al-Inshaqaq, this indicates that person. And God Almighty will bless him with food and abundance. He will achieve many of the goals and ambitions that he wanted to achieve. And if A man saw in a dream that he was reading Surat Al-Inshaqaq, this indicates that this man will soon marry a righteous woman and have good offspring from that woman. This man has many offspring and God blesses girls and boys. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Inshaqaq in a dream for a single girl. If the girl sees For an unmarried woman, Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream, this indicates that this girl wants to achieve many goals and ambitions. After this dream, this woman will be able to achieve all those goals and aspirations that she wants. And if an unmarried girl sees in a dream someone reading Surat Al-Inshiqaq, this indicates However, this person has precedence over this girl and that this girl will marry him and her wedding date is approaching. Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream, this means that this woman will soon be blessed by God with pregnancy. And he has a righteous wife. He has many sons and daughters. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is reading Surat Al-Inshiqaq, this indicates that this woman lives with her husband in a happy and stable life full of love and affection. She will receive a lot of good food and plenty in her life. Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Inshiqaq in A dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream, this means that this woman is close to her due date. And that she and her fetus will be in good health, and may God bless her with everything she loves and desires. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is reading Surat Al-Inshiqaq, this means that This woman feels fear and anxiety. As her due date approaches, she is worried about the fetus, and after this dream, she and her fetus will be in good health. Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a divorced woman’s dream: If a divorced woman sees Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream, this means that this woman faces many worries, problems, and difficulties. After this dream, this woman will get rid of these worries and difficulties. If a divorced woman sees herself reading Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream, this means that she is a woman. May God reunite her with her husband and she will live a happy and stable life with him. He will compensate for the previous life he was living. Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Inshiqaq In a man’s dream, if a man sees a surah

title: Interpretation of a dream about black ants

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about black ants in a dream for a single woman: A single girl may see black ants in her dream, and this is what makes her worry, but scientists have interpreted this with many interpretations, such as: When she sees black ants in a dream, black ants indicate that her mind is busy constantly thinking about the affairs of her life. It also indicates that if he sees in the bed of an unmarried woman, he will be blessed with a good husband and good offspring who will benefit the nation. However, if he appears in clothes, this indicates her elegance and beauty. Some interpreters have interpreted it when they generally saw it as distress or illness that the dreamer or girl may be exposed to. Which she dreams of. If an unmarried woman sees ants multiplying in her hair, this is evidence of a serious illness that afflicts her and she must be protected from it. Interpretation of a dream about black ants in a dream for a married woman. And if it is a married woman who sees black ants in a dream, then she also has many thoughts and situations that We explain it in: It is a sign of pregnancy, childbirth, and raising good offspring that will benefit her and her community. Black ants in a dream for a married woman indicate that she will be blessed with a male and help her. The color of termites can be associated with black ants and this is an indication that he has been provided with a lot of money on his way to him. In a way In general, black ants have a praiseworthy vision of nutrition, offspring, and family stability for a married woman. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of seeing ants on the wall in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of black ants in a dream for a divorced woman. Black ants also appear when they see a divorced woman. There are many interpretations that can be realized in reality, For example: If a divorced woman sees black ants in her dream, this indicates the difficulties she faces and the ease of her life. Seeing black ants indicates that the woman will be blessed with a husband who will compensate her for the failure of her first marriage. But if a divorced woman sees black ants on her clothes or furniture, this is evidence of the presence of envious people. So he should beware of them. Seeing black ants in a divorced woman’s dream indicates in some cases that her children are fair to her and will not leave her. Black ants on the body and hair indicate the presence of diseases that may affect the divorced woman. If black ants fill the place in abundance, this means that the divorced woman is busy. In many trivial things. Interpretation of a dream about black ants in a man’s dream and its meaning. Sometimes black ants appear to a person in a dream, which means many things to him in his life, and we distinguish some of them as follows: Black ants, if they walk on his hands, this indicates a close marriage if the man Single, divorced, or widowed. Seeing a black ant is evidence of the company of an honest and loyal business partner with him. If the ants walk on food and eat from it, then this is a sign of the disappearance of distress, worry, and sadness from the sleeper. But if a man sees in his dream black ants in large quantities, he will invade Where he lives, this is a sign of a bright future. Seeing a swarm of black ants infiltrating the house in Villon indicates the stability of the house and the condition of those inside it. And the great goodness that will spread among the members of this man’s family.

title: Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi. Onions are one of the fruits that are very beneficial for health, but many do not prefer them due to their unpleasant odor and the pain they cause to the eyes when they are cut. Seeing them in a dream can be normal in some cases, because onions are present in every home and everyone eats them. It has in different periods, but there are some interpretations that must be mentioned about this dream, so in the continuation of the article we will tell you the interpretation of seeing onions in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of seeing onions in a dream When the dreamer sees green onions in a dream, this may It indicates that the dreamer will be blessed by God Almighty with a lot of money. This may mean that the dreamer will give him good money. Health.• When the dreamer sees green onions in large quantities in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will feel anxiety, sadness, and anguish and may also indicate that the dreamer will leave someone close to him and loves.• When the dreamer sees onions but cannot eat them in the dream, This may indicate that a lot of good things will come to the dreamer, but he just has to try as he sees the onion. Dreaming of the owner of onions in a dream may indicate that the owner of the dream will be cured by God Almighty from a disease that befell him. When the dreamer sees that the owner of the dream in a dream has become thin by eating onions, this may indicate that the owner of the dream will overcome everyone who opposes him, as happens when he sees The dreamer sees onions in the dream during the trip, this may indicate that the dreamer will achieve security for him on the way.• When the dreamer sees cooked onions in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will repent to God Almighty and get closer to God, as this may indicate Until the dreamer is the one who will say bad things. • When the dreamer sees himself eating onions while he is sick in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will die, and when the dreamer sees himself peeling onions and shedding tears. In a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will win over his competitors. Interpretation of the dream of seeing onions in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen When the dreamer sees onions in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will try to earn money in all possible ways, such as if the dreamer sees Onions in a dream and he was not religious, and this may mean that the dreamer will benefit from haraam money. • When you see the dreamer eating onions after cooking them in a dream and he is religious, this may indicate that the dreamer will follow the path of truth and repent to God as the dreamer sees Onions in a dream and he was religious, and this may indicate that the dreamer will achieve goodness for him in his life. • When you see the dreamer with onions in a dream, it may mean that the dreamer will die if this person is sick while waking up, and when the dreamer sees onions in In a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will succeed in all his affairs. • When the dreamer sees onions in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will achieve what he wants in the coming period.
